snippet: The motive behind the 2006 murder of Anna Politkovskaya, a reporter who was an unstinting critic of the Kremlin, was to instill fear in journalists, a top criminal investigator said.
abstract: Russian criminal investigator says motive behind 2006 murder of Anna Politkovskaya, veteran reporter who was an unstinting critic of the Kremlin and its policies in Chechnya, was to instill fear in country’s journalists.
lead_paragraph: The motive behind the 2006 murder of Anna Politkovskaya, a reporter who was an unstinting critic of the Kremlin, was to instill fear in journalists, a top criminal investigator said.

headline.seo: Russian Investigator Speaks About Anna Politkovskaya Killing
headline.main: Russian Reporter’s Murder Was Meant as a Message, Investigator Says
